mapper.insert:
insert into transform_event_record (id, unique_identity, client_ip, short_url, long_url, short_url_digest, long_url_digest, compression_code, record_time, user_agent, cookie_value, query_param, province, city, phone_type, browser_type, browser_version, os_type, device_type, os_version, transform_status, creator, editor, create_time, edit_time, version, deleted) VALUES
( #{record.id}, #{record.uniqueIdentity}, #{record.clientIp}, #{record.shortUrl}, #{record.longUrl}, #{record.shortUrlDigest}, #{record.longUrlDigest}, #{record.compressionCode}, #{record.recordTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{record.userAgent}, #{record.cookieValue}, #{record.queryParam}, #{record.province}, #{record.city}, #{record.phoneType}, #{record.browserType}, #{record.browserVersion}, #{record.osType}, #{record.deviceType}, #{record.osVersion}, #{record.transformStatus}, #{record.creator}, #{record.editor}, #{record.createTime, jdbcType=DATE}, #{record.editTime, jdbcType=DATE}, #{record.version}, #{record.deleted} )
